column1: Local Foods////Since I was confused by the place I'd like to give a tip. There is a cash register and you do order at the counter (lol).Thank you to the yelper who wrote that because I was extremely confused. The cashier we had was very nice and easy to talk to. He explained everything to us about the place
column3: and also exchanged pretty awesome small talk in my opinion. He also came by to talk to us when we finished out meal which I always think is nice. A+ for the service.
